Detailed Description

Template renderer and response object

Member Function Documentation

MicroRender::__call ( $  name,
$  args = null 
)

Delegates method calls to the helper, or failing that generates a template with the given template name

Parameters:
string $view
array $args
Returns:
string

MicroRender::template ( $  name  ) 

Renders a given template, wrapping it with the layout template if it exists, and placing the result in the response body. Templates that start with an underscore are considered partials, and their contents are returned without being wrapped.

Parameters:
string $name
Returns:
string
